short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert and backup your Kindle e-book to PDF in one click without need to install any software or a Kindle device

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert and backup your Kindle e-book to PDF files in just one click without need to install any software or to own a Kindle device.

How to use it:

- Open your e-book at https://read.amazon.com/
- Set the font size and page details the way you like.
- Resize your browser window to match how you want the final PDF to look.
- Click the extension button and start converting right away!
